next after Self attention you have this Auto regressive processing and this is
where the model processes the input token one at a time and attempts to predict the next token so not the next
word but the next token based on what it's seen so far and at this point it's
trying to consider what does good morning mean and then we go over to the
generation piece the language generation and so here it's starting the
